name: Tactus
description:
(Can be played with both keyboard/Mouse or Controller, however controller highly recommended)

Dodge, reflect and control the beat in Tactus, a "bullet hell" wave survival game with a rhythmic twist.

A capstone project created for our final semester studying at RMIT, Tactus was made by a team of 4 students in a little under 4 months.
Developed by:
Jack Bruxner
Ben Turner
Ruairi Daws
Lily Harrison
